Iwo akukhulupirira Yehovaakunga phiri la Ziyoni, losasunthika, likhazikika kosatha.
Monga mapiri azinga Yerusalemu,momwemo Yehova azinga anthu ake,kuyambira tsopano kufikira nthawi zonse.
Pakuti ndodo yachifumu ya choipa siidzapumula pa gawo la olungama;kuti olungama asatulutse dzanja lao kuchita chosalungama.
Chitirani chokoma, Yehova, iwo okhala okoma;iwo okhala oongoka mumtima mwao.
Koma iwo akupatula kutsata njira zao zokhotakhota,Yehova adzawachotsa pamodzi ndi ochita zopanda pake.Mtendere ukhale pa Israele.
